overview: Filmed at The Garage, Islington on Sunday 31st March 2013, featuring  Dave Mastiff vs Noam Dar  Paul Robinson vs MK McKinnan (Natural Progression Series)  Nathan Cruz vs Jimmy Havoc  London Riots vs Hunter Brothers  Loco Mike Mason vs Mexican Eagle  Team DEFEND vs Bhangra Knights  El Ligero vs Ricoche
title: PROGRESS Chapter 6: We Heart Violence
